note.p: Colonial official. Held a series of positions as assistant government agent, and district judge, in several provinces of Ceylon (Sri Lanka), beginning in 1837.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/2517/19/7)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 December 2019)
